summary: A small-time thief is recruited by the police to infiltrate a notorious gang in an effort to thwart an illegal cigarette smuggling scheme.
cast: Vadivelu|Sada|Pradeep Singh Rawat|Raja Krishnamoorthy|Adithya Menon|Mahanadhi Shankar|Motta Rajendran|Santhana Bharathi|Bose Venkat|Raj Kapoor|Muthu Kaalai|Bava Lakshmanan|Besant Ravi
title: Eli
